reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup**

RDA/ Velocity Coil/ 6 Wrap Single Fused Kanthal Clapton 2×26 core 32 wrap W/ 45 Wicking/ Full cotton bacon v2 Ω/0.26

**Testing**

Steep Time/2 weeks % Used/ 4
PG/VG 50/50 Nic%/0

**Mouth Feel**

Heavy on the nose light on the tongue, moderately dense 6 out of 10

**Throat Hit**4/10

**Flavor Properties**

Light and flaky sugar cookie, slightly buttery with a hint of vanilla, not overly sweet, with a slightly nutty flavor. 

**Relatable Flavors**

To me this is a dry sugar cookie similar to inw biscuit and Fa cookie in that respect.

**Off flavors**

The vanilla comes off slightly Floral, and a lingering aftertaste not unpleasant just notable.

**Position In The Recipe**

Could see this working as part of a cookie base, or as a Accent to other bakeries and cookie flavorings.

**Pairings**

Bakeries, creams, tobacco's, dark berries, stone fruits, caramels, chocolates, butterscotch, and coconut flavorings.

**Notes**

Compared to cap the sugar cookie, not as good as a representation of a moist sugar cookie. But still very useful and worth having in the collection.

As always here is a Wikipedia on sugar cookies, and where you can buy it.

 https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sugar_cookie

 http://www.bullcityvapor.com/sugar-cookie-fw/

**Rating** 75/100

*Please if your opinion differs, or you have another review for this post it in the comments. Will help the master list with multiple reviews in one spot.*
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Sugar Cookie
